mapper.insert: insert into account(name, phoneNum,password, realName, idCard, photo,address,status,monthBreakTimes,sumBreakTimes) values(#{name},#{phoneNum},#{password},#{realName},#{idCard},#{photo},#{address},#{status},#{monthBreakTimes},#{sumBreakTimes});
mapper.update: update account set name=#{name},phoneNum=#{phoneNum},password=#{password},realName=#{realName}, idCard=#{idCard},photo =#{photo},address =#{address},status =#{status},monthBreakTimes =#{monthBreakTimes},sumBreakTimes =#{sumBreakTimes} where id=#{id}
mapper.select: select * from account join (select accountId from bookorder where id=#{id})b on b.accountId=account.id
